text: Raal kamator inmani ngaikha kei'n ka Pathian Biak-inn khan kachou ngaikha kamin-esik eii, halli inmani'n khawa Biak-inn kha mathaan nunujei. Kei'n inmani chungnga kei Pathian raming kha kamajia sik eii halli kei Pathian khuopui, marwaan makheiya kei Pathian diangnga inphut kajuosik akathar Jerusalem raming kha-um inmani chungnga kamajiasik eii. Inmani chungnga kei raming kathar kha-um kei'n kamajiasik eii.” Chonglar 21:2; Isa 62:2; 65:15
